name: Papertollo
description:
GMTK Game Jam 2020 Project

  • A 48 hour game making marathon, focused on design, mechanics, and clever ideas. 
  • Time: From July 10th, at 8PM UK time, to July 12th, at 8PM UK time.
  • Theme: Out of Control
  • Development time: 9h
  • Team size: 2 developers
  • Note that the game doesn't have an end!

Made by Antti & Henna
